articles.description: Eagled-eyed fans have been scouring for clues but caught a glimpse of something more unexpected.
articles.content:
Line of Duty might be clever at keeping us guessing over the identity of H but directors made a gaffe during last night's episode. 
 Eagle-eyed fans are always on the lookout for extra information o… [+1403 chars]
